TYPE source /etc/nova/openrc\n WAIT 10 SEC SINK 3 SEC
#################################################################################### #################################################################################### # TODO: Collections of logs should be moved out to the postTest fragment as a last # step to be performed irregardless of PASS or FAIL or it should be the last test case to run #################################################################################### LOOKFOR SINK 2 SEC TYPE system host-list \n WAIT 30 SEC SAVEOUTPUT ${WASSP_TC_RUN_LOG}/system-host-list.log DELAY 3 SEC CALL cat ${WASSP_TC_RUN_LOG}/system-host-list.log LOOKFOR

CALL rsync -r -e 'ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ' root@$env.NODE.target.Boot.oamAddrA:/root/*.zip ${WASSP_TC_RUN_LOG}/
